survey_brief: This survey aims to understand public preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable transportation options, including barriers to adoption and satisfaction levels with existing services.

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable transportation options do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections. Ensure options are clear and cover common sustainable transportation methods.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable transportation options do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use sustainable transportation options?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format. Ensure the scale covers a broad range of frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use sustainable transportation options?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose sustainable transportation options? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of access to a personal vehicle
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one option in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with an 'Other' option for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an open-text follow-up for 'Other'.
